name: Pizza Fairy
description:
• Be the cute pizza fairy!
  • Throw pizza at evil mushrooms!
  • Enjoy!

Pizza fairy is a 2.5D platformer that was made for our education during an internal 2-day-game jam.

The team behind Pizza Fairy consists of 6 people: 
Romuald as Engineer
Silvan as Producer and Assistant Engineer
Linus as Designer
Armin as 3D Artist
Jessy as Concept & Environment Artist
Nicole as Concept & Character Artist
